revised_title: Separation and Subdivision of Lunar Soil Samples from Luna 16 and 20 Missions
tldr: The authors separated and subdivided two 0.5g samples of lunar soil collected by Luna 16 and 20 missions into various fractions based on size, visual appearance, density, and magnetic susceptibility. The samples were further distributed to eight laboratories for further analysis, including mineralogy, petrology, and isotopic studies. This study aimed to maximize the information obtained from the limited samples available.
